short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rotate any image in Chrome with ease!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Rotato allows you to select any image on the web and rotate it around to suit your needs.

Extremely easy to use, just open the extension and select an image. A red border will show up around the image indicating that it's ready to rotate. 

After you click "close" on the pop-up the border will go away but the image will stay that way.
